task.title: Fix codex auth 404 for workspace members

events.content: Check workspace membership not just ownership: Check workspace membership not just ownership

raw.question: Check workspace membership not just ownership
raw.chosen: Check workspace membership not just ownership
raw.reasoning: Other endpoints already do this correctly, codex-auth-helper was missing it

retrospective.summary: Fixed 404 error when workspace members (non-owners) use codex auth endpoints. Added membership check to cli-session, tunnel-info, and auth-status endpoints.
